name: Cop N' Cat
description:
Purcival Pounce is one the best thieves of the century. He’s slick, sneaky, and cunning, and only one person has ever been able to keep up with him; Detective Noruff Nyx, the most skilled cop in town. After a lengthy chase, Detective Nyx is able to apprehend Pounce, but before she could put him behind bars, he revealed some important information about a dangerous artifact. The aquamarine sword, the jewel of the local museum. Now the two rivals must work together to acquire the sword and place it somewhere where it will be safe- all without being caught.


Controls

When playing as Pounce:

W,A,S,D to move

Mouse to move camera

Left click to tail whip attack

Right click to roll

Hold Right click to crawl

Space bar to jump (hold for higher jump)

When playing as Nyx:

W,A,S,D to move

Mouse to move camera

Left click to open locked doors

Press "Q" to switch between the characters!

The Boaris Brothers will chase after Pounce, but not Nyx. Find a way to the sword!
